original_title: 2023 O/L exam to commence at over 3,500 centres
original_body_lines: The 2023 G.C.E. Ordinary Level examination begins today at 3,527 centres across the island and with 452,979 candidates expected to sit for the exam.
Accordingly, the Commissioner General of Examinations requests candidates to arrive early at their respective examination centres with their admission and valid identity cards.
